import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams, useLocation, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index) => ( ))} )}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
